languageKey.label: TemplaVoilà

The TemplaVoilà extension contains a unique point'n'click template mapping engine, a new content element type "Flexible Content" (for fixed-template elements) and a new page module for building web-pages with nested content elements.
Tutorial (Futuristic Template Building) | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_tut_ftb1/
EXT:templavoila/cshimages/intro.png
One part of TemplaVoilà is the unique template mapping system which visually shows HTML tags from the template file and allows the user to map data to HTML elements by a single mouseclick.
